MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 12:01 pm in the LL63 and LL64 postcode areas of Ty Croes and Rhosneigr following reports of a grounded overhead cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:06 pm on 28th December, 2020.
